s.text: Richards, now 64 and a successful pediatric ophthalmologist, advises other men who want, as she did, to change genders in middle age not to do it, according to the Star . "You better get on Thorazine or Zoloft or Prozac," she advises.

If the tabs haven't really been able to move on, neither has Monica, reports the Enquirer . Her new plan is to win Bill back by starring on her own TV talk show.
